messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] car wash
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/20/2003 11:30:07 AM Central Standard Time, ... Yes, but I m much too lazy for that and my husband doesn t mind going.  At least not when I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/20/2003 11:30:07 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Did you know you can wash a car by hose and hand? Then you don't have to go
> through the car wash. :-)
> Mary Ellen
>

Yes, but I'm much too lazy for that and my husband doesn't mind going. At
least not when I remind him. He also get the cars filled with gas - the
fumes bug my asthma. I'm pretty high maintenance, I guess.

Elizabeth


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
